SageTVPlugin.Name: MediaShrink
SageTVPlugin.Description: An external utility for compressing Videos and DVD's using Handbrake. NOTE: Requires external setup using Sage Job Queue (SJQ) to function, see MediaShrink thread in SageTV customization forums for configuration details.
SageTVPlugin.Author: evilpenguin
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: * v3.0.4 * Fixed support for DVD's with DTS audio * Fixed support for VideoRedo v4 * Fixed issue where mkvmerge would fail trying to attach empty files * Fixed issue where DVD's were named improperly when complete * Fixed issue where when using batch file SJQ would always report the job as failing * Fixed issue where MediaShrink wouldn't be able to detect if Handbrake or Videoredo crashed or failed * Added /handbrakeFullCommand for specifying a full custom command line * Added support for handbrake profiles. For example /handbrakeProfile "Universal" /container mp4
